Package monsterfighter.core

Class RandomEvent

java.lang.Object
monsterfighter.core.RandomEvent
public class RandomEvent extends Object
Class that models random events that can occur when a player rests in the monster fighter application

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    RandomEvent(ArrayList<Monster> party)
    Constructs the random events that may occur when the player rests.

  • Constructor Details

    • RandomEvent

      public RandomEvent(ArrayList<Monster> party)
      Constructs the random events that may occur when the player rests.
      Parameters:
      party - The player's party of monsters

  • Method Details

    • getLevelUp

      public List<Boolean> getLevelUp()
      Gets the list of booleans that informs which Monster's in the Player's party will or won't level up.
      Returns:
      An array of booleans that corresponds to the player's party. If the value is true then the corresponding monster will level up and false otherwise.

    • getMonsterLeaves

      public List<Boolean> getMonsterLeaves()
      Gets the list of booleans that informs which Monster's in the Player's party will or won't leave.
      Returns:
      An array of booleans that corresponds to the player's party. If the value is true then the corresponding monster will leave the party and false otherwise.

    • getMonsterJoins

      public boolean getMonsterJoins()
      Gets a boolean that is true if a Monster will join the Player's party and false otherwise.
      Returns:
      The boolean corresponding to whether or not a monster will join the player's party

    • monsterLevelUp

      public List<Boolean> monsterLevelUp(ArrayList<Monster> party)
      Calculates which Monster's in the Player's party will or won't level up and adds true or false to a list based on the result.
      Parameters:
      party - The player's party of monsters
      Returns:
      The list corresponding to the monster's in the player's party that may or may not level up

    • monsterLeaves

      public List<Boolean> monsterLeaves(ArrayList<Monster> party)
      Calculates which Monster's in the Player's party will or won't leave and adds true or false to a list based on the result.
      Parameters:
      party - The player's party of monsters
      Returns:
      The list corresponding to the monster's in the player's party that may or may not leave

    • monsterJoins

      public boolean monsterJoins(ArrayList<Monster> party)
      Calculates whether a Monster will join the Player's party
      Parameters:
      party - The player's party of monsters
      Returns:
      A boolean corresponding to whether or not a monster will join the player's party
